p: However, in the case of human melanoma A375 cells, the data obtained ( Figure 3) revealed that both extracts, OBHE and OBAE manifest an important cytotoxic effect, the lowest viability (64.42%) being registered when the cells were exposed to the highest concentration—150 µg/mL of OBHE. Nevertheless, the A375 cells stimulated with the concentration of 150 µg/mL OBAE expressed viability of 76.40%. Apart from these treatment groups, cell viability rates were above 83%.
